lead_paragraph: This interview with Quintin E. Primo III, co-founder and chief executive of Capri Capital Partners, was conducted and condensed by Adam Bryant for the latest edition of Corner Office. Capri is a real estate investment and development firm based in Chicago.
snippet: Quintin E. Primo III, the chief of Capri Capital Partners, says new college graduates should leave the United States to broaden their cultural horizons.

headline.main: Get a Diploma, but Then Get a Passport

abstract: Quintin E. Primo III, the chief of Capri Capital Partners, says new college graduates should leave the United States to broaden their cultural horizons.
